READ: if you want to play in english(go to 2k forum there is the answers) you have to modify the game files,so go to c:\users\username\appdata\roaming\bioshock\...., there is the ini file,jus scroll down the tekst when you find engine,engine there is language READ CAREFULLY:delete the tekst ahhr... what a fuck,go to google and write "bioshock switch language"

For every1 who wants to turn this Bioshock into ENGLISH:

Goto your application data folder and then to roaming. find the bioshock folder there and search for a .ini files.
you have to scroll down to Engine.Engine and change RUS into INT (international which is english)

and then goto yout normal bioshock folder and search in that directory and submaps to files with _rus or .rus at the end of the filenames and change it into _eng or .eng (not Int)

i hope i can help some people with this and sorry for my bad english because im dutch and also in a hurry :P
